long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline Your California Fair Plan Experience

Enhance your workflow on the California Fair Plan (CFP) portal with our specialized Chrome Extension. Designed exclusively for use on the CFP website, our tool automatically generates accurate premiums and produces branded PDFs containing detailed quote information, broker details, and insuree dataâ€”all with a single click.

Key Features:

Seamless Integration: Activates only when you're on the CFP portal, ensuring a smooth and focused quoting process.
Customizable Quotes: Easily adjust attributes and select from multiple deductible options to tailor each quote to your needs.
Professional PDFs: Generate clean, branded PDF documents that include all essential details for your clients.

Subscription Details:
Access all features for just $10 per user upon subscription.

Simplify your quote generation process and deliver professional, accurate quotes effortlessly with our Chrome Extension for the California Fair Plan portal.
